channel.title: Learning experience bot [help needed]
channel.description:
I am making an optical based bot, solely to learn java. I have learned so much about java and computers, that i am actually considering going on and majoring in CS :). If you wanted to help and pitch in, just PM me. You too will learn alot. Some features I have added so-far: [*]coded in java [*]minimizable [*]scriptable [*]OCR (40-50 ms to gather the last chat sender and text he/she sent, and the health/prayer/summoning)
PM me only if you are interested. This is a learning experience bot project :)
